Location of DNA extraction: Infectious Diseases Research Laboratory (IDRL) Molecular, Indus Hospital, Karachi, Pakistan
location of DNA sequencing: Infectious Diseases Research Laboratory (IDRL) Molecular, Indus Hospital, Karachi, Pakistan
QC filter prior to assembly: Read filter: removed 1 sample with only 4 kbp of sequence

DNA extraction method: QIAamp DNA Mini Kit (Qiagen), with an additional RNAse step
read pre-processing: Adapter trimming: Trim Galore (v0.4.3), Merging overlaps: Flash (v1.2.11)
QC filter post assembly: Sample inclusion criteria: contig count ≤500, genome size >=4969898 & <= 6132846 bp, %GC content >= 56.35 & <= 57.98

location of DNA sequencing: Sequencing Core Facility, National Institute for Communicable Diseases (NICD), Johannesburg, South Africa

location of DNA sequencing: Child Health Research Foundation (CHRF), Dhaka, Bangladesh
library preparation method: NEBNext Ultra II FS DNA Library Prep Kit (NEB)

location of DNA sequencing: Research Neuberg Center for Genomic Medicine, Ahmedabad, India
library preparation method: NEBNext Ultra II Directional RNA Library Prep Kit (NEB)

location of DNA sequencing: Vaccine Research and Development, Pfizer, Pearl River, New York

location of DNA sequencing: KEMRI Wellcome Trust Research Programme, Kenya; and International Livestock Research Institute (ILRI), Nairobi, Kenya
